Back To Recipes

Clean counter space:

Empty dishwasher
Load dishwasher
Put away anything not related to recipe away

Get out the following ingredients:

1 Lentils
1 Water
1 Dried Onion and wash
1 Tandori Masalla
1 Salt

Recipe

Put in 2 1/4 cup in a pot 1 Lentils
Put in 6 1/4 cup in a pot 1 Water
Wait 3 minutes Turn on heat to 3 with no lid for 3 minutes
Season with tandori masalla, dried onion, and salt
Wait 2.5 minutes Turn on heat to 3 with no lid for 2.5 minutes
Wait 2.5 minutes Turn on heat to 8 with no lid for 2.5 minutes
Wait 5 minutes Turn on heat to 8 with no lid for 5 minutes
Season with 1 Tandori Masalla 1 Dried Onion 1 Salt
